plot: A satire inspired by Mad Men, looking at the 1960s advertising industry from the eyes of three black advertising workers as they weave their way through a racially insensitive 1960s world ...
title: Mad Black Men
plot_es: A satire inspired by Mad Men, looking at the 1960s advertising industry from the eyes of three black advertising workers as they weave their way through a racially insensitive 1960s world ...
plot_en: A satire inspired by Mad Men, looking at the 1960s advertising industry from the eyes of three black advertising workers as they weave their way through a racially insensitive 1960s world ...
